interestingFact: Estimated global population is around 8 billion as of 2024.
India surpassed China in 2023 to become the world's most populous country.
The U.S. has the world’s largest economy by nominal GDP.
Indonesia is the world's largest island country, made up of over 17,000 islands.
Pakistan is home to K2, the second highest mountain in the world.
Nigeria is Africa’s most populous country and has over 500 spoken languages.
Bangladesh has one of the highest population densities in the world.
Mexico City is one of the oldest cities in the Americas, built on the ruins of the Aztec capital Tenochtitlan.
Tokyo is the world’s most populous metropolitan area.
The Philippines is made up of over 7,600 islands and has the world’s third-largest Catholic population.
Ethiopia is one of the few African countries never colonized and is considered the cradle of human civilization.
